languages.text: "Я не могу позволить сие. Мирянам запрещено посещать обитель, а лицезреть ковчег святыни позволено лишь избранным. Вы и ваша свита — паломники особого статуса, дарованного Императором. Но всякого лишенного благословения Омниссии солдата, что переступит порог обители, я нареку еретиком и прикажу предать смерти".

"I cannot allow this. Laypeople are forbidden from visiting the monastery, and only a select few are allowed to behold the ark and the relic within. You and your retinue are pilgrims of a special status bestowed by the Emperor. However, should any soldier unblessed by the Omnissiah cross this monastery's threshold, I will deem them a heretic and have them put to death."
languages.original_text: "Я не могу позволить сие. Мирянам запрещено посещать обитель, а лицезреть ковчег святыни позволено лишь избранным. Вы и ваша свита — паломники особого статуса, дарованного Императором. Но всякого лишенного благословения Омниссии солдата, что переступит порог обители, я нареку еретиком и прикажу предать смерти".

traits.locale_text: "I cannot allow this. Laymen are forbidden from visiting the monastery, and only the select are allowed to behold the ark and the relic within. You and your retinue are pilgrims of a special status granted to you by the Emperor. However, should any soldier unblessed by the Omnissiah cross this monastery's threshold, I will deem them a heretic and have them put to death."

"I cannot allow this. Laymen are forbidden from visiting the monastery, and only the select are allowed to behold the ark and the relic within. You and your retinue are pilgrims of a special status granted to you by the Emperor. However, should any soldier unblessed by the Omnissiah cross this monastery's threshold, I will deem them a heretic and have them put to death."

You and your retinue are pilgrims of a special status bestowed by the Emperor. However, should any soldier unblessed by the Omnissiah crosses this monastery's threshold, I will deem them a heretic and have them put to death."

"I cannot allow this. Laypeople are forbidden from visiting the monastery, and only a select few are allowed to behold the ark and the relic within. You and your retinue are pilgrims of a special status bestowed by the Emperor. However, should any soldier unblessed by the Omnissiah crosses this monastery's threshold, I will deem them a heretic and have them put to death."

"I cannot allow this. Laypeople are forbidden from visiting the monastery, and only a select few are allowed to behold the ark and the relic within. You and your retinue are pilgrims of a special status bestowed by the Emperor. However, should any soldier unblessed by the Omnissiah cross this monastery's threshold, I will deem them a heretic and have them put to death."

"I cannot allow this. Laypeople are forbidden from visiting the monastery, and only a select few are allowed to behold the ark and the relic within. You and your retinue are pilgrims of a special status bestowed by the Emperor. However, should any soldier unblessed by the Omnissiah cross this monastery's threshold, I will deem them a heretic and have them put to death."

languages.text: "Ich kann das nicht zulassen. Es ist Laien verboten, das Kloster zu besuchen, und nur wenige Auserwählte dürfen den Schrein und das Relikt darin sehen. Ihr und Euer Gefolge seid Pilger, denen der Imperator einen speziellen Status gewährt hat. Sollte jedoch ein Soldat, der nicht vom Omnissiah gesegnet wurde, die Schwelle dieses Klosters überschreiten, so werde ich ihn als Ketzer ansehen und töten lassen."
languages.original_text: "I cannot allow this. Laypeople are forbidden from visiting the monastery, and only a select few are allowed to behold the ark and the relic within. You and your retinue are pilgrims of a special status bestowed by the Emperor. However, should any soldier unblessed by the Omnissiah cross this monastery's threshold, I will deem them a heretic and have them put to death."

traits.locale_text: "Ich kann das nicht zulassen. Es ist Laien verboten, das Kloster zu besuchen, und nur wenige Auserwählte dürfen den Schrein und das Relikt darin sehen. Ihr und Euer Gefolge sind Pilger, denen der Imperator einen speziellen Status gewährt hat. Sollte jedoch ein Sodlat, der nicht vom Omnissiah gesegnet wurde, die Schwelle dieses Klosters überschreiten, so werde ich ihn als Ketzer ansehen und töten lassen."

languages.text: « Je ne peux le permettre. Il est interdit aux profanes de pénétrer dans le monastère et seuls de rares élus ont le droit de contempler l'arche et la relique qui s'y trouve. Vous et les vôtres n'êtes que des pèlerins profitant d'un statut spécial accordé par l'Empereur... Toutefois, si quelque soldat non béni par l'Omnimessie franchissait le seuil de ce monastère, je le déclarerais hérétique et le ferais mettre à mort. »
languages.original_text: "I cannot allow this. Laypeople are forbidden from visiting the monastery, and only a select few are allowed to behold the ark and the relic within. You and your retinue are pilgrims of a special status bestowed by the Emperor. However, should any soldier unblessed by the Omnissiah cross this monastery's threshold, I will deem them a heretic and have them put to death."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne peux le permettre. Il est interdit aux profanes de pénétrer dans le monastère et seuls de rares élus ont le droit de contempler l'arche et la relique qui s'y trouve. Vous et les vôtres n'êtes que des pèlerins profitant d'un statut spécial accordé par l'empereur... Toutefois, si quelque soldat non béni par l'Omnimessie franchissait le seuil de ce monastère, je le déclarerais hérétique et le ferais mettre à mort. »

languages.text: “我不能允许你这么做。教外人士禁止参观修道院，只有极少数人可以瞻仰庇护所与里面的遗物。你和你的随从是帝皇派来的朝圣者，拥有特殊身份。然而，如果任何未经欧姆尼塞亚保佑的士兵敢跨进修道院门槛半步，我就会将他们视为异端分子，就地格杀。”
languages.original_text: "I cannot allow this. Laypeople are forbidden from visiting the monastery, and only a select few are allowed to behold the ark and the relic within. You and your retinue are pilgrims of a special status bestowed by the Emperor. However, should any soldier unblessed by the Omnissiah cross this monastery's threshold, I will deem them a heretic and have them put to death."

traits.locale_text: “我不能允许你这么做。教外人士禁止参观修道院，只有极少数人可以瞻仰庇护所与里面的遗物。你和你的随从是帝皇派来的朝圣者，拥有特殊身份。然而，如果任何未经欧姆尼塞亚保佑的士兵敢跨进修道院门槛半步，我就会将他们视为异端分子，就地格杀。”

languages.text: 「私には、それを許すことはできぬ。一般人が修道院を訪れることは禁じられており、選ばれた者だけが箱舟とその中の遺物を見ることを許されている。あなたとあなたの従者は、皇帝から授けられた特別な身分を持つ巡礼者です。しかし、万機神の祝福を受けていない兵士がこの修道院の敷居をまたぐようなことがあれば、私は彼らを異端者とみなし、死刑に処するだろう」
languages.original_text: "I cannot allow this. Laypeople are forbidden from visiting the monastery, and only a select few are allowed to behold the ark and the relic within. You and your retinue are pilgrims of a special status bestowed by the Emperor. However, should any soldier unblessed by the Omnissiah cross this monastery's threshold, I will deem them a heretic and have them put to death."

traits.locale_text: 「私には、それを許すことはできぬ。一般人が修道院を訪れることは禁じられており、選ばれた者だけが箱舟とその中の遺物を見ることを許されている。あなたとあなたの従者は、皇帝から授けられた特別な身分の巡礼だす。しかし、万機神の祝福を受けていない兵士がこの修道院の敷居をまたぐようなことがあれば、私は彼らを異端者とみなし、死刑に処するだろう」

languages.text: «No puedo permitirlo. Los laicos tienen prohibido visitar el monasterio y solo unos pocos pueden contemplar el arca y la reliquia que contiene. Su séquito y usted son peregrinos de un estatus especial otorgado por el Emperador. Sin embargo, si algún soldado no bendecido por el Omnissiah cruza el umbral de este monasterio, lo consideraré un hereje y lo haré ejecutar».
languages.original_text: "I cannot allow this. Laypeople are forbidden from visiting the monastery, and only a select few are allowed to behold the ark and the relic within. You and your retinue are pilgrims of a special status bestowed by the Emperor. However, should any soldier unblessed by the Omnissiah cross this monastery's threshold, I will deem them a heretic and have them put to death."

traits.locale_text: «No puedo permitirlo. Los laicos tienen prohibido visitar el monasterio y solo unos pocos pueden contemplar el arca y la reliquia que contiene. Su séquito y usted son peregrinos de un estatus especial otorgado por el Emperador. Sin embargo, si algún soldado no bendecido por el Omnissiah cruza el umbral de este monasterio, lo consideraré un hereje y lo haré ejecutar».

languages.text: "Buna müsaade edemem. Avamın, manastırı ziyaret etmesi yasaktır ve ark ile içindeki yadigârı görmeye pek az kişinin izni vardır. Sen ve maiyetindekiler, İmparator'un bahşettiği özel bir statüye nail hacılarsınız. Ancak Hermesih tarafından kutsanmamış bir asker bu manastırın eşiğinden adımını atacak olursa onu kâfir beller ve canını alırım."
languages.original_text: "I cannot allow this. Laypeople are forbidden from visiting the monastery, and only a select few are allowed to behold the ark and the relic within. You and your retinue are pilgrims of a special status bestowed by the Emperor. However, should any soldier unblessed by the Omnissiah cross this monastery's threshold, I will deem them a heretic and have them put to death."

traits.locale_text: "Buna müsaade edemem. Avamın manastırı ziyaret etmesi yasaktır, ark ve içindeki yadigârı görmesine çok az kişinin izni vardır. Sen ve maiyetindekiler, İmparator'un buyruğunca özel bir statüye nail birer seyyahsınız. Ancak Hermesih tarafından kutsanmamış bir asker bu manastırın kapısından geçmeye cüret ederse onu bir kâfir beller ve yaşamına son veririm."
